title: dog_feeding_record_following_morning_reference
summary: Record of dog feeding activity following the morning care cycle.
description: A visual record documenting the feeding of dogs as part of routine animal care. This entry follows the morning feeding reference and confirms continuity of daily care without measurement instruments or automation.

reference_context.note: This feeding activity references the morning care cycle recorded earlier.
